name: Toltec and the mysteries of the Secret Island
description: “Toltec and the mysteries of the secret island” is an Atmospheric physics based action game ,with stunning hand-painting graphics , immersive sound score and simple yet amazing game-play.
minimum_requirements: OS: WINDOWS  7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q9650  or AMD equivalent or better Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 770 or AMD equivalent or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: The target resolution of this game : 1080P/60FPS , Your graphic card must support WebGL
